Welcome adventurers!

Step into Sarnia’s go-to spot for nonstop fun and chill vibes. Take aim in our multi-level laser tag arena—loaded with sneaky hideouts and perfect perch spots. Scale new heights on the rock climbing wall and put your skills to the test. Or slow things down with a round of mini golf, where each hole adds its own twist. Whether you're chasing thrills or just looking to unwind, this is your place to do it all.

Welcome adventurers!

Step into Sarnia’s go-to spot for nonstop fun and chill vibes. Take aim in our multi-level laser tag arena—loaded with sneaky hideouts and perfect perch spots. Scale new heights on the rock climbing wall and put your skills to the test. Or slow things down with a round of mini golf, where each hole adds its own twist. Whether you're chasing thrills or just looking to unwind, this is your place to do it all.

Activities

Mini Golf

Relax and have fun with our 10-hole mini golf course perfect for all ages.

Our Prices

We make it easy to have fun without breaking the bank. Whether you're dropping in with a friend or planning a group outing, our activities are ready when you are—no stress, just good times.

Walk-In Activities

Mini Golf $10 per person
One round 10-hole mini golf
Laser Tag $14 per person
20 minute game of laser tag
Laser Tag $16 per person
30 minute game of laser tag
Rock Climbing $16 per person
3 rock climbs
Rock Climbing $20 per person
30 minutes of rock climbs
Rock Climbing $25 per person
One hour of rock climbs

Group Packages

Keep in mind!
Groups must have 6 people minimum. Pricing is per person.
Double Trouble $26 per person
  • Two 20 minute games of laser tag
Climb & Conquer $32 per person
  • Two 20 minute games of laser tag
  • Two rock climbs
Putt & Play $32 per person
  • Two 20 minute games of laser tag
  • One round of 10-hole mini golf
